lead_paragraph: Striker Shane Long has backed Southampton to beat Tottenham Hotspur in the Premier League on Sunday, allowing manager Ronald Koeman to claim the one scalp that has eluded him over his two seasons in charge at St Mary's.

headline.print_headline: Long Targets Spurs Win to Complete Set for Koeman
headline.main: Long Targets Spurs Win to Complete Set for Koeman
